messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Herbal Remedies HELP
messages.msgSnippet: Dag - My daughter Dagny (who I call Dag) loves your name! ~Rue ... From: Dagmar Jones [mailto:dag@gdi.net] Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2001 8:29 AM To:
messages.messageBody:
Dag - My daughter Dagny (who I call Dag) loves your name! ~Rue

-----Original Message-----
From: Dagmar Jones [mailto:dag@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2001 8:29 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Herbal Remedies HELP


I would start your son on echinacea tincture. Herbs for Kids makes a great
one with Glycerin vs alcohol which works well for kids and does not have the
sting of alcohol. This will help his immune system in dealing with the
infection. On the cut itself, I would apply some calendula tincture to
clean it and then a thin layer of calendula salve. All these items should
be available at
your health food store. Dag

messages.subject: Herbal Remedies HELP
messages.msgSnippet: I would start your son on echinacea tincture.  Herbs for Kids makes a great one with Glycerin vs alcohol which works well for kids and does not have the sting
messages.messageBody:
I would start your son on echinacea tincture. Herbs for Kids makes a great one with Glycerin vs alcohol which works well for kids and does not have the sting of alcohol. This will help his immune system in dealing with the infection. On the cut itself, I would apply some calendula tincture to clean it and then a thin layer of calendula salve. All these items should be available at
your health food store. Dag
